text: Data analytics is all about gathering evidence, interpeting information and telling stories.

This app provides a window into the data behind the FIFA 2021 football game. As an example of what a business application could achieve with data like customers or products, the app demonstrates functionality such as filtering, searching, high level analytics based on user selections and more.
Raw data was sourced from kaggle.com, processed and transformed using python into a SQLite database and accessed via a custom-built API, written using Flask and hosted through AWS.
